text: Ariana Grande is among a number of celebrities offering thoughts and messages to the victims of terror attacks in London on Saturday night. “ Praying for London, ” Grande wrote on Twitter after the incidents, which left at least seven dead and another 48 hospitalized, according to authorities. The attacks — a hit - and - run of pedestrians and multiple stabbings — occurred at two locations near the Thames River and were deemed “ terrorist incidents ” by local law enforcement. As reported by the Associated Press, “ The incidents occurred on [ London Bridge ] and at Borough Market, a popular area with bars and restaurants on the south side of the bridge. ” Police killed three suspects just eight minutes after the initial emergency call. Grande is scheduled to perform Sunday in Manchester, England, at a star - studded benefit concert for victims of the Manchester
